select sss.*,`user`.`name` teachername from (SELECT t.id,t.teacherno,t.begintime,t.stoptime,t.makerid,t.maketime,t.classid,t.`dostatus`,t.`code`,t.score,c.classname,u.`name`,r.`name` rolename,t.is_fen as isFen FROM teacherplan t left join tbl_class c on t.classid=c.id left join `user` u on t.makerid=u.id left join organization o on c.orgid = o.id left join user_role ur on ur.user_id = t.teacherno left join role r on r.id = ur.role_id WHERE c.graduate = 0
and t.classid = #{classid}
and o.id in (#{orgids})
and DATE_FORMAT(stoptime,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')
and t.begintime >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begintime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and t.stoptime <= DATE_FORMAT(#{stoptime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY t.id ASC) sss ,`user` where sss.teacherno =`user`.id
and `user`.`name` like concat(concat('%',#{teachername}),'%')
